features: REPAIR SHAMPOO & CONDITIONER: MONDAY Haircare REPAIR Shampoo & Conditioner is an intensely nourishing and restorative shampoo for dry, damaged and depleted hair. It contains hydrating natural ingredients such as Keratin, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Vitamin E to leave hair feeling healthy and replenished.
PREMIUM FORMULAS: MONDAY Haircare’s range of Shampoo and Conditioners is dermatologically tested, pH-balanced, and SLS-free and paraben-free. With MONDAY, every day can be a good hair day.

CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE: MONDAY Haircare’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme by Cruelty Free International. MONDAY is also recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals.
RECYCLABLE BOTTLES: Not only do MONDAY’s little pink bottles look great in your shower, they’re made from recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill.
body.description: MONDAY Haircare REPAIR Shampoo & Condidiner is an intensely nourishing and restorative shampoo for dry, damaged and depleted hair. It contains hydrating natural ingredients such as Keratin, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Vitamin E to leave hair feeling healthy and replenished. MONDAY Haircare’s shampoo and conditioners are award winning, Leaping Bunny approved, dermatologically tested, pH balanced, SLS free and paraben free. With MONDAY, every day can be a good hair day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Lifesaver for All Hair Types!
reviews.reviewText: I had the pleasure of trying out the MONDAY HAIRCARE Repair Shampoo and Conditioner Set, and I must say, it has been a game-changer for the diverse textures of hair in my family. This dynamic duo comes in 12oz bottles and is specifically formulated for dry to damaged hair, making it the perfect solution for our varying hair needs.First and foremost, the Repair Shampoo is a gentle yet effective cleanser that doesn't strip the hair of its natural oils. It lathers up nicely and has a luxurious feel, leaving the hair feeling clean without that overly dry sensation. What's impressive is that it caters to all hair textures, from straight to curly, making it a versatile choice for our household.The Repair Conditioner is the perfect complement to the shampoo, offering deep hydration and nourishment. It's enriched with ingredients that work wonders on dry and damaged hair, leaving it noticeably softer and more manageable. The lightweight formula doesn't weigh the hair down, making it suitable for those with finer strands as well.One of the standout features of MONDAY HAIRCARE is its delightful fragrance. The Repair Shampoo and Conditioner have a fresh and invigorating scent that lingers on the hair, creating a pleasant and uplifting experience during every wash.What sets this set apart is its ability to cater to the different needs of everyone in my family. My straight-haired family members feels sleek and smooth, while my curly hair have noticed increased definition and reduced frizz. It's rare to find a product that performs so well across various hair types, and MONDAY HAIRCARE has certainly delivered.Additionally, the packaging is sleek and user-friendly, with easy-to-use pumps that dispense the right amount of product without any mess. The 12oz size is also perfect for regular use without the fear of running out too quickly.MONDAY HAIRCARE Repair Shampoo and Conditioner Set have earned a permanent place in our shower routine. Its ability to address the needs of dry to damaged hair across different textures makes it a standout product in the market. If you're looking for a reliable, versatile, and effective hair care solution, give MONDAY HAIRCARE a try – your hair will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was introduced to this brand a couple of years ago when I had forgotten to pack mine for a trip.My daughter stopped at a store on our way and bought this for me. She said that she had used this brand and loved it. She had bought for fine hair which I have and I have loved it. When I tried to reorder l ended up with the for frizzy and curly formula which didn't work at all for me.I went back to the website and found this formula for dry and damaged hair. Wow! It really made my hair feel like brand new. Because I have fine hair, I periodically have a perm and it can damage the ends of the hair shaft.This Monday shampoo and conditioner for dry and damaged hair was amazing.I now go back and forth between fine hair and this one for dry and damaged.I have used some very expensive brand shampoos before, but this Monday brand has beat them hands down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you have long hair, read this!
reviews.reviewText: I received this product Dec 15 and it is nearly the end of January. For years I have had to wash my hair at least three times per week. When I received this shampoo I kept my usual routine and then I realized I could wait another day, then another, then another, and so on. I have very long hair and it is a chore to wash and would take hours to dry. Also, I have an area on my crown that tends to get oily. I brush and comb my hair frequently throughout the day. It's been nearly a week since I washed my hair and the photos are cropped but otherwise unretouched.The shampoo and conditioner smell nice, but not perfumey. It really just smells "fresh".One other note, I don't have to use much of this product, and I only apply conditioner around my face, on the neck area and down the length.I don't have flyaways and haven't had as much breakage as with other products. I have used Pantene and so other salon type products, but this is by far the best I have used in the past ten years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was impressed with this product at first then after 3 washes made my hair dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but the scent is off
reviews.reviewText: This really does make my hair feel good, it's shiny and soft after I use it. However, the scent is so strange and is making me not wanna buy again. It smells almost like lemongrass which I love, but for some reason it also smells like something burning. Like burnt hair a little. At first I thought it was just my hair from styling it, but I have used it when I have not styled my hair and smelled inside the bottle as well, and it is definitely the shampoo. The conditioner isn't as bad, but it's just strange. It doesn't leave much of that burnt hair smell on my hair like the next day, but in the shower it just smells wrong and when my hair is wet as well. I like the shampoo and conditioner a lot, but idk. Also the pump sucks lol, you get barely any shampoo, you gotta pump like 5-6 times to get what you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice! Ordered another set already!
reviews.reviewText: Smells good, made my hair feel good and I like there is not sulfates in it. I was looking for a comparable good smelling shampoo to the old Revlon Outrageous (remember how good that smelled, and you would know when women were wearing it when they walked by!?) and read that this shampoo was similar. I did not think it was, but it does have a stronger clean scent so far compared to others, so i already ordered another set. Left my hair feeling soft and not tangled, so that's a winner to me!
